statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT address, contact_number FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 4;
SELECT name, contact_number FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT name, address FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, contact_number FROM CustomerInformation WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY contact_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE address IN ('123 Main St', '456 Elm St');
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Car';
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, contact_number FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT name, contact_number FROM customers JOIN policies ON customers.customer_id = policies.customer_id WHERE policies.start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY name ASC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM policies ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, policy_type FROM customers JOIN policies ON customers.customer_id = policies.customer_id WHERE policy_type = 'Health Insurance';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT policy_name, amount FROM policies JOIN payments ON policies.policy_id = payments.policy_id;
SELECT customer_id, name, address, policy_name, amount, date FROM customers JOIN policies ON customers.customer_id = policies.customer_id JOIN payments ON policies.policy_id = payments.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_type FROM policies WHERE policy_type='Life Insurance';
SELECT c.name, p.policy_name, py.amount FROM customers c JOIN policies p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN payments py ON p.policy_id = py.policy_id ORDER BY c.name, py.amount DESC;
SELECT p.policy_name, py.amount, py.date FROM policies p JOIN payments py ON p.policy_id = py.policy_id WHERE py.date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, contact_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM Policies WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT claim_amount, claim_date FROM Claims WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE policy_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM Customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT Customers.name, Policies.policy_type, Claims.claim_amount FROM Customers JOIN Policies ON Customers.customer_id = Policies.customer_id JOIN Claims ON Policies.policy_id = Claims.policy_id WHERE Customers.name = 'John Doe';
SELECT Customers.name, COUNT(Policies.policy_id) AS num_policies FROM Customers LEFT JOIN Policies ON Customers.customer_id = Policies.customer_id GROUP BY Customers.name HAVING num_policies > 1;

SELECT Customers.name, SUM(Claims.claim_amount) AS total_claims FROM Customers JOIN Policies ON Customers.customer_id = Policies.customer_id JOIN Claims ON Policies.policy_id = Claims.policy_id GROUP BY Customers.name ORDER BY total_claims DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, coverage FROM Policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT agent_id, name, commission_rate FROM Agents ORDER BY commission_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, coverage FROM Policies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT(email) FROM Customers JOIN Policies ON Customers.customer_id = Policies.customer_id WHERE coverage = 'health';
SELECT agent_id, commission_rate FROM Agents WHERE commission_rate > 10.00 ORDER BY commission_rate DESC;
